content: the beautiful memory throw by nerissa muijs is made in scheepjes stone washed xl and river washed xl this throw is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks also available in print form scheepjes stockists **yarn requirements ** scheepjes stone washed xl / river washed xl 70% cotton 30% acrylic 15g/22 5m yarn a 1 colour pack 50 x 15g balls or 15g of stone washed xl / river washed xl per motif in your preferred colours scheepjes stone washed xl 70% cotton 30% acrylic 50g/75m yarn b 841 moon stone x 9 balls the pattern is available as a digital download in dutch german spanish swedish french and english uk and us terms the pattern is also available as a hardcopy booklet in dutch uk english swedish and german available from scheepjes retailers
